tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently underwent ACL reconstruction surgery performed by Dr. Pradeep Kocheeppan, and I'm very happy to recommend him to anyone facing a similar situation. Dr Kocheeppan is a highly skilled orthopedic surgeon who instilled confidence throughout the entire process.

His expertise was evident from the initial consultation. He clearly explained the procedure, answered all my questions patiently, and addressed any concerns I had. During the surgery itself, I felt completely at ease thanks to his professionalism and experience.

Dr Kocheeppan encouraged me to start physiotherapy before the surgery, and this pre-surgical physiotherapy proved to be invaluable. As a result, my rehabilitation process after the surgery was smooth and pain-free. I'm now recovering well and on track for a full return to activity. Dr. Kocheeppan's surgical skill, guidance, and commitment to comprehensive patient care played a vital role in this positive outcome.

Moreover, Dr Kocheeppan also performed a successful knee replacement surgery on my father-in-law, which further solidified my impression of him as a well-rounded and highly skilled orthopedic surgeon who excels in both ACL reconstruction and joint replacements.

If you're looking for a top-notch orthopedic surgeon for ACL reconstruction, knee replacement, or any other orthopedic need, I highly recommend Dr Pradeep Kocheeppan. His expertise, combined with his focus on comprehensive patient care, makes him an outstanding doctor.

When Angel takes the form of Doctor : Last year, I fell down in metro station and my leg fractured severely, soon after this, admitted to Jayanagar Appolo Hospital. After the preliminary investigation, Doctor at the emergency told us surgery needs to be done. In that situation first name of the Doctor came in our mind was Dr. Pradeep Kocheeppan as we visited earlier also, very nice, well behaved, has the ability to take right decision. We kept the faith on him, and we were not wrong. He did the surgery, device implanted into the broken bones. After the accident, it was a dream for me that I would walk again. Yes, after the initial recovery period. I started walking prpoerly. I believe, it became possible because of Dr. Pradeep Kocheeppan's treatment. 
Thank you Doctor. 🙏🏻

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: For the first time I am writing any review for a doctor as I felt it was utterly needed to save some other patient from wasting thr valuable time. If I have to define him in words that would be.. rude, unfriendly, insensitive, judgemental. For every word that a patient speaks is being judged and is spoken to in a sarcasm which definitely does not help in curing the disease!! I was told to not think about the problem in spite of the fact that I already told him that I dont have time to sit and think about anything. But if pain is thr it is thr. Later I was diagnosed with an infection in foot being the reason for my problem and it could be worse if I would have just sat and not think about the pain.  **** **** **** ******* ** ********** *** ******* ** **** *** ***** **** **** ** ******** ** ***** *** *** ********  He dint even bother to talk properly and immediately called sister for giving reports of some other patient while we were still thr sitting for some solution. * **** ***** *** **** ******** ** ** ****** **** *** trust me I have had some very bad experiences but still never felt the need of writing a review. I dont mind anybody calling me. And i am not keeping this anonymous.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I took my 84 year old father to the doctor due to his acute knee pain  and swelling. I am going to summarize my experience in below points.  Then it is upto you to decide if you are going to spend your time/ energy / money in seeing this doctor
> The doctor did not even touch my father  or examined his knee by making him physically
> The doctor kept sitting on his chair and asked my father (who is having balance issue as no strength in one knee) to stand erect by keeping his foot together so that he can observe the difference by sitting on his chair a far apart . My father was loosing balance and was about to fall if I was not supporting him  that time. But doctor kept sitting.

> After this  kind of examination and by reading the fathers  latest xray report ( done from a different hospital as asked by a different doctor) he immediately turned to my father and kept telling him that he should go only for knee replacement no matter what risk is there , but the patient and only the patient should  take that risk. He may die in the process but thats how it should be . He should be ready to take the risk by his own decision

> He indirectly pointed towards me and kept telling my father that your children may not take your responsibility for operation but it is their duty to  take this up..  **** ** ********** ** **** ***** **** **** **** * * *** ** *** *** *** *** *** **** *** *** *** **** **** ** *** *** ****** *** **************. Just that we are scared to take him for an operation at this age, as I also have an ailing mother to look after. On this his response was what if your father also becomes bed ridden like your mother . Then you have  2 patients to look after

> Finally after 2 mins (entire follow up ) he wrote a prescription with some pain killing drugs*** *** ****** ** ***********  *  ***** ******** ******** ***** ** *** *********** * **** ***  ******* *** **** ** ********* *** ******* * should be avoided  by all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Being a patient who wanted treatment or some sort of remedies for lower back pain* * *** ****** ********* *** ******** **** ** *** *******  ******** ** ** ******** 
First of all when I enter what I see Is Doctor Standing near table and talking to some Man(other doctor may be). Then I entered he didnt even ask me to sit, directly he asked me whats issue so I stood n said about My lower back pain then he asked me to check weight there and then told me to rotate legs and I told him I have a moving Feeling on my knees still doctor hasnt  come and touched the knee or checked physically. Still he stood far hands tied back and asked me about the exercise I do and I said yoga and at times I go to gym. Then he started Talking like scolding About the exercises that our generation do and I was asked to stand straight near wall and by just looking he concluded you will need a surgery on your legs because your legs are little bend and if you dont  go for surgery now but you will have to do It in your future to correct your legs it seems And then told me now you do these tests and come back whenever youre done and I was like what. Surprised to see these many tests Cbc,esr,tsh,creat-,vitd,vitb12,sgot,sgpt,xray-bothknee,xray Lspine. Despite of any facts a doctor should be polite and make the patient comfortable first and thats what make a doctor An angel in patients life !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Valuable insights on aspect of rehab. Doctor has an almost elephant like memory of case history, and is available 24*7 for help.  Such high level of dedication, kindness, and sincerity from such a senior doctor is beyond imagination. this man lives out the Hippocratic oath.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is rare find. Doctor who is really worried about his patient keen for his recovery oversees every part of treatment personally. He is exceptionally good doctor and if you have knee leg related problem please goto him. He will ensure best treatment for you. I would strongly recommend him always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Professional. Gave sufficient time to my case. Heard my case in detail. Gave me satisfactory options. But I am still confused what is my next step as I am unable to decide all by myself!!!
